history.proof: intros H1 H2. destruct H2 as [n Hn]. pose (bounded_min P H1 n) as H3. destruct H3 as [H3 | H3]. - destruct H3 as [k H3]. exists k. destruct H3 as [Hk1 [Hk2 Hk3]]. split. apply Hk2. intros i Hi. apply Hk3. qsimpl use: le_lt_or_eq. - qsimpl use: le_lt_or_eq.

ctx: pose (bounded_min P H1 n) as H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment P : nat -> Prop H1 : forall x : nat, P x \\/ ~ P x n : nat Hn : P n k : nat Hk1 : k < n Hk2 : P k Hk3 : forall i : nat, i < k -> ~ P i i : nat Hi : i < k Unable to unify "?M1444 < ?M1445 \\/ ?M1444 = ?M1445" with "S i <= k".

ctx: pose (bounded_min P H1 n) as H3.
exceptions.exn: No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.

ctx: pose (bounded_min P H1 n) as H3.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable k.

ctx: pose (bounded_min P H1 n) as H3.

original: intros H1 H2. destruct H2 as [n Hn]. pose (bounded_min P H1 n) as H3. destruct H3 as [H3 | H3]. - destruct H3 as [k H3]. exists k. destruct H3 as [Hk1 [Hk2 Hk3]]. split. apply Hk2. intros i Hi. apply Hk3. apply le_lt_or_eq. apply Hi. - destruct H3. apply Exists_Forall_neg in H3. contradiction. exists n. split. apply Hn. intros i Hi. apply H3 in Hi. assert (i < n \/ i = n) as [Hlt | Heq] by apply le_lt_or_eq. + contradict Hlt. apply H3 in Hlt. apply Hlt. + subst. contradiction.
